core.ctrl

Class TransferController

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.ctrl.Controller
      • core.ctrl.TransferController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandHandler, TransferListener

    public abstract class TransferController
extends Controller
    Transfer Controller Spawns transfers when user enters CLI commands
